faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in the Data Science Training?
faqs.answer: Our Data Science Online Training includes core modules such as Python Programming, Statistics, Machine Learning, Neural Networks, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing (NLP), MLOps, and real-world Capstone Projects. For a detailed module breakdown, please refer to our data science course syllabus.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: The data science training sessions are conducted from Monday to Saturday, with each class lasting 1 hour per day to ensure consistent and interactive learning.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, weekend batches are not available. Our live data science online course runs Monday to Saturday for optimal engagement.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, recorded sessions are available for self-paced learners. However, doubt clarification sessions are exclusive to live training batches.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer internship opportunities based on your performance in mock assessments and capstone project evaluations, giving you valuable industry exposure.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, our data science course is designed as a comprehensive program. Modules are not offered separately to ensure a complete learning experience.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, our expert team helps you create a compelling resume, highlighting your data science certificate program experience and project work to stand out in job applications.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, a laptop or desktop is essential for hands-on exercises with Python, data analysis, and machine learning tools used throughout the data science training.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for the Data Science Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is necessary. The course begins with the fundamentals. A basic understanding of math, statistics, or programming is helpful but not mandatory.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We start from the basics and gradually move to advanced topics, making the course ideal for beginners and professionals alike.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support job placement with mock interviews, resume reviews, and career guidance. We also share job leads from our industry network and hiring partners.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we guide you through obtaining a data science certificate, including preparation tips and mock questions for recognized industry certifications.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, all training sessions are recorded and accessible through our portal. In addition, we provide module-wise study materials and reference content.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we share updated interview questions and conduct mock interviews to help you prepare for real-world job interviews.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Tools or Platform Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide access to all necessary tools and platforms used during training, including cloud-based environments—no installations needed.

faqs.question: Can I Retake This Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, upon enrollment, you get a 1-year membership allowing you to attend multiple batches to reinforce your understanding.

faqs.question: Can I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, upon completing the training, you will receive a Data Science Certificate that adds value to your professional profile.

faqs.question: Is Any Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: Basic coding is introduced during the course, particularly in Python. No advanced programming background is needed to get started.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, one-on-one personalized training is available on request. Note that pricing differs from group sessions.
